titles.title: Designating the week beginning April 18, 1993, as "Primary Immune Deficiency Awareness Week".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E449)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Designates the week beginning April 18, 1993, as Primary Immune Deficiency Awareness Week.
